name: Play BoysCraft
description:
Open sandbox with adventures, travel the world where you can meet different characters, in the game you will find three game modes: classic survival, creative with a variety of biomes (high mountains, summer landscapes, endless desert, cold massive lands, dangerous canyons, and many Other amazing places) and "Township" mode, where you can continue the development and construction of the city.
An unique system of character selection (for boys and girls), a variety of maps, searching for resources and craft items, hiking in abandoned caves, creating various buildings, and much more will not let you get bored!

Game features:
- Generation of the world and biomes.
- Extraction of the minerals, the creation of the subject.
- Completely free game for children and adults.
- A large variety of interior and decoration.
- Explore the world, mine treasures and make new friends.
